Data will be organized in a clear folder structure on OneDrive, following the dataset table. Each folder will have its subfolders,
depending on the content of the dataset. Data will have specifications indicating the source, date and type. Most of the folders
will have subfolders divided by case studies.
A README file will clarify the logic of the structure and where to find the items.
